name: node-red-contrib-set-defaults
description: A Node-RED node that can set undefined values on context or msg to configured default value. It can send those values out with msg.

scripts.test1_nr1: mocha --grep "should set flow parameters 1_nr1 and multi flow parameters 2_nr1" "test/**/*_spec.js"
scripts.test1_nr8: mocha --grep "should set msg and flow and msg explicit, multilevel, 1_nr8 and 2_nr8" "test/**/*_spec.js"
scripts.test3_nr2: mocha --grep "should set global, msg only if not set already" "test/**/*_spec.js"
